metrics.name: Contract attach rate
metrics.description: Service tickets with attached customer contract
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE "Ticket Contract" IS NOT NULL)
/
COUNT(case_id)*100

metrics.name: First time fix rate
metrics.description: Rate of first time fixes for tickets
metrics.signalFragment:
(COUNT (case_id) FILTER(WHERE ((SELECT COUNT (event_name) FILTER (WHERE event_name IN ('Technically Completed')) < 2) ))
/ 
COUNT (case_id) )*100

metrics.name: Average number of tickets per customer
metrics.description: Average number of tickets per customer

metrics.name: Ratio of escalated tickets
metrics.description: Rate of tickets that were escalated

metrics.name: Average response time
metrics.description: Average time from ticket creation to first response
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN (${rts_response_events}))
	-(SELECT FIRST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN (${ticket_creation_events}))
   )

variables.name: rts_response_events
variables.description: Events defining the response to a recently opened case, for example 'In Progress - Accepted', 'In Progress - Approved'

variables.name: ticket_creation_events
variables.description: Events defining the start events of a case, for example 'Open'
